TestNumber.title: Test Number
TestNumber.description: A number for this test for purposes of e.g., tracking lab sequence.

FluidSampleID.title: Fluid Sample ID
FluidSampleID.description: Unique identifier of the Fluid Sample which Atmospheric Flash and Compositional Analysis is done on

TypeOfInjectedGas.title: Type of Injected Gas
TypeOfInjectedGas.description: Type of injected gas, example: Regular

TypeOfMultiContactTest.title: Type of Multiple Contact Test
TypeOfMultiContactTest.description: Type of multiple contact test, example: Miscibility Test

GasSolventCompositionReference.title: Gas Solvent Composition Reference
GasSolventCompositionReference.description: Gas solvent composition reference, example: CO2
